item.title: Pre-specified variables as default arguments in Rcpp(armadillo)
item.description: Lately, I’m using Rcpp and RcppArmadillo a lot to speed up the computational work of my current research project. I stumbled over a lot of problems which are easily solved in R but a pain to get working in C++ Armadillo. So I thought, I’d share some of my solutions. The first one is here.
